body: actually if I don't detach the new tensor, then I don't need to raise a warning. Is it true? What is the expected behavior of `as_tensor`. Should it be taking the same behavior as `torch.tensor()` and `tensor.new_tensor()` when copy from tensor of different `dtype` and `device`?
